title: 美參議員英霍夫：中共必須就武肺大流行負責

replies.msg:
The Chinese Communist Party must be held accountable for the detrimental role it played in this pandemic. The CCP’s outright deception about the origin and spread of the virus cost the world valuable time and lives as it began to spread.

The #COVID19 Accountability Act will pressure Beijing to provide a full account of the events leading up to this devastating outbreak. America is strong and we will come out of this crisis, but the CCP must face the facts and take accountability for its actions.

The Chinese Communist Party has paid lip service to cooperation, but has practiced deception. For the sake of global health, it’s time for Beijing to be held to account. Thank you, @LindseyGrahamSC, for leading this effort.

https://twitter.com/JimInhofe/status/1260292993921228800?s=19
